publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2346 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees— (a) that consideration of the Protection of Children and Prevention of Sexual Offences (Scotland) Bill at Stage 1 be completed by 18 March 2005; and (b) that consideration of the Further and Higher Education (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 be completed by 18 March 2005. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
